text: Barbara Marx Sinatra (née Blakeley; March 10, 1927 – July 25, 2017) was an American model and showgirl. She was born in Bosworth, Missouri. She was married to Zeppo Marx from 1959 to 1973 and was the fourth and final wife of Frank Sinatra from 1976 until his death in 1998.Sinatra, Barbara (2011). Lady Blue Eyes: My Life With Frank. 172 pp. Crown Archetype. New York. In 1998, a Golden Palm Star on the Palm Springs Walk of Stars was dedicated to her.Palm Springs Walk of Stars by date dedicated Sinatra died on July 25, 2017 in Rancho Mirage, California of natural causes at the age of 90. ==References== ==Other websites== * Photos from Life Magazine Category:1927 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in California Category:American models Category:Philanthropists from Missouri Category:Entertainers from Missouri Category:Frank Sinatra
title: Barbara Sinatra
